mapper.sql: id, interface_name, interface_url, interface_type, request_type, request_user_type, sort_desc_num, catelog_index, is_deleted, create_time, last_update_time, param_detail, param_class_name
mapper.insert: insert into t_interface (interface_name, interface_url, interface_type, request_type, request_user_type, sort_desc_num, catelog_index, is_deleted, create_time, param_detail, param_class_name) values (#{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceType,javaType=InterfaceType}, #{requestType,javaType=RequestType}, #{requestUserType,javaType=UserType}, #{sortDescNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catelogIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), #{paramDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramClassName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_interface set interface_name = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interface_url = #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interface_type = #{interfaceType,javaType=InterfaceType}, request_type = #{requestType,javaType=RequestType}, request_user_type = #{requestUserType,javaType=UserType}, param_detail = #{paramDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_class_name = #{paramClassName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
